DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate 0.15% brimonidine tartrate in patients with primary open angle glaucoma and ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of 0.15% Brimonidine Tartrate in Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma and Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension Used AlphaganÂ® in previous 3 months
